overview: Love comes in many forms for stunning TS beauties and their beaus in the second volume of TransSensual's erotic vignette series, TS Love Stories. Nerdy Chad Diamond tries to break up with his hot girlfriend Chanel Santini, after realizing she is too beautiful for him, but Chanel gives him a big surprise. Statuesque Casey Kisses is worried that rock star boyfriend Ruckus will stray on his upcoming tour, but Ruckus reassures her in the sexiest way possible. Nikki Vicious is not comfortable with boyfriend D. Arclyte's predilection for BDSM, which prompts a very heated discussion, and finally, Aubrey Kate has strong words with boyfriend Brendan Patrick after he finds out she still has a sugar daddy. Featuring TS stars Aubrey Kate, Chanel Santini, Casey Kisses and Nikki Vicious with sexy co-star Brendan Patrick, Ruckus, D. Arclyte and Chad Diamond.
tagline: Lust is Intoxicating but Love Transcends.
title: TS love stories 2
